trans-unit.source: Provides several different visual representations for a list of selectable items.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder flere ulike visual representasjoner for en liste med elementer som kan velges.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: The SelectionList class maintains the selection of single or multiple selected items.
trans-unit.target: Klassen SelectionList opprettholder utvalget av én eller flere av de valgte elementene.

trans-unit.source: The SelectionList is derived directly from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl> class and does not have any of the pagination handling properties, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter.ItemWeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: SelectionList hentes direkte fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl>klasse og ikke har noen paginering behandler egenskaper, som den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter.ItemWeight%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter.ItemWeight%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the server control that an element, either XML or HTML, was parsed, and adds the element to the server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls*> collection object.
trans-unit.target: Varsler serverkontrollen at et element, XML eller HTML, ble analysert, og legger til elementet i serverkontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls*>collection-objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls*>

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: The object reference to add to the server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls*> collection object.
trans-unit.target: Objektreferanse til å legge til serverkontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls*>collection-objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls*>

trans-unit.source: Creates items in an items collection from the specified dataSource parameter.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter elementer i en elementsamlingen fra den angitte dataSource parameteren.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this method for custom data-binding behavior.
trans-unit.target: Arving klasser kan overstyre denne metoden for egendefinert databinding virkemåte.

trans-unit.source: The source from which items in the collection are created.
trans-unit.target: Kilden som elementer i samlingen er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data member to extract when data binding to a list data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir datamedlemmet å trekke ut når data binding til en datakilde i listen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: This property is only used if the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.DataSource%2A> property is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>, rather than of type <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes bare hvis verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.DataSource%2A>egenskapen er av typen <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>, og ikke av typen <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data member to extract when data binding to a list data source.
trans-unit.target: Datamedlemmet å trekke ut når data binding til en datakilde i listen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source of the list that is being bound.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir datakilden i listen som er bundet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: To bind a data source to a list, you must first use the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DataBind%2A> method to ensure data binding.
trans-unit.target: For å binde datakilde til en liste, må du først bruke kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DataBind%2A>metode for å sikre databinding.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data source can either be of type <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>, or it can be of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden kan være av typen <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>, eller det kan være av typen <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: If the data source is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.DataMember%2A> field to specify which member to extract.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakilden er av typen <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.DataMember%2A>feltet for å angi hvilken medlem skal hente.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>

trans-unit.source: The data source of the list that is being bound.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden for listen som er bundet.

trans-unit.source: Specifies which property of a data-bound item to use when binding an item's <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text*> property.
trans-unit.target: Angir hvilken egenskap for et element databundet skal brukes når et element-bindingen <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: The property of a data-bound item to use when binding an item's <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text*> property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen for et element databundet skal brukes når et element-bindingen <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Specifies which property of a data-bound item to use when binding an item's <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Value*> property.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: The property of a data-bound item to use when binding an item's <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Value*> property.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"></xref> allows multiple selections.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"> </xref> tillater flere valg.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: To create a multiple-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>, set its <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.SelectType%2A> property to <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListSelectType?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Opprette en flere utvalg <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>Angi <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.SelectType%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListSelectType?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListSelectType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.SelectType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"></xref> allows multiple selections; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"> </xref> tillater flere valg; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item in the list is bound to data.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når et element i listen er bundet til data.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: When an item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList> control is created and data-bound, this event handler sets the properties of the list item from arbitrary expressions.
trans-unit.target: Når et element i en <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>kontrollen er opprettet og databundet, denne hendelsesbehandlingen egenskapene for listeelementet fra tilfeldig uttrykk.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>

trans-unit.source: An item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList> control is of type <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>.
trans-unit.target: Et element i en <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>kontroll er av typen <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised as each data source item is bound.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når hver kilde dataelement er bundet.

trans-unit.source: This is the best time to filter or group items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection> collection, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Dette er det beste tidspunktet for filter eller en gruppe elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection>samling, ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Value%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of items in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection"></xref> list.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer samlingen av elementer i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection"> </xref> listen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom samling.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: You can add or remove items from a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList> collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til eller fjerne elementer fra en <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>samling ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Remove%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A>metoder for <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>

trans-unit.source: The collection of items in the selection list.
trans-unit.target: Samling av elementer i utvalgslisten.

trans-unit.source: Processes the postback data for this control.
trans-unit.target: Behandler sende tilbake dataene for denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IControlAdapter.LoadPostData%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IControlAdapter> object referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.Adapter%2A> property to load data into the control from the post data sent by the client browser.
trans-unit.target: Metoden LoadPostData bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IControlAdapter.LoadPostData%2A>-metoden på den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IControlAdapter>objektet som refererer til den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.Adapter%2A>til å laste inn data i kontrollen fra post dataene som sendes av klientleseren.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.Adapter%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IControlAdapter> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IControlAdapter.LoadPostData%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there is no device-specific handling for loading the postback data on this control, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IControlAdapter.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen enheten-spesifikk behandling for å laste inn sende tilbake dataene på denne kontrollen, og deretter den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IControlAdapter.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden returnerer `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IControlAdapter.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen identifikatoren for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming named values.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen av alle innkommende navngitte verdier.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"></xref> changes as a result of the postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"> </xref> endringer etter tilbakesending; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: the call to <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IControlAdapter.LoadPostData*> on the object referenced by <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.Adapter*> returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kallet til <> </> *> på objektet som refererer til <> </> *> returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.SaveViewState*> method.
trans-unit.target: Gjenoppretter visningsstatus informasjon fra en tidligere sideforespørsel som er lagret av den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.SaveViewState*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.SaveViewState*>

trans-unit.target: Standard implementering hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.SelectedIndexChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.SelectedIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this method to perform other tasks.
trans-unit.target: Arving klasser kan overstyre denne metoden for å utføre andre oppgaver.

trans-unit.source: An object defined by an <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som er definert av et <xref:System.EventArgs>objekt som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"></xref> that the post data has changed.
trans-unit.target: Varsler den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"> </xref> som post-dataene er endret.

trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A> method with <xref:System.EventArgs.Empty> as the event argument.
trans-unit.target: Kall av <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>metode med <xref:System.EventArgs.Empty>som argument for hendelsen.</xref:System.EventArgs.Empty> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows in the selection list.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antall rader i utvalgslisten.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 4; the minimum is 1, with no maximum.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 4. minimum er 1, med ingen grense.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows in the selection list.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader i utvalgslisten.

trans-unit.source: an attempt was made to set the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"></xref> value to less than zero.
trans-unit.target: forsøk på å angi den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"> </xref> verdi til mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: Saves any server control view-state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer alle serverkontroll visningsstatus endringer som har forekommet siden siden ble posteres tilbake til serveren.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: Ingen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer indeksen for det valgte elementet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er -1.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: If the control is in multiple selection mode, this property returns the index of the first selected item.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen er i flere valgmodus, returnerer denne egenskapen indeksen for det første valgte elementet.

trans-unit.source: The selected index cannot be set declaratively; use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Selected%2A> property of a list item instead.
trans-unit.target: Den valgte indeksen kan ikke angi deklarativt; Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Selected%2A>-egenskapen til en liste element i stedet.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Selected%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the SelectedIndex to -1 to clear the selection.
trans-unit.target: Angi SelectedIndex til&1; for å oppheve valget.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to dynamically remove items from the list.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når du vil fjerne dynamisk elementer fra listen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for det valgte elementet.

trans-unit.source: an attempt was made to set the SelectedIndex property to less than <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""></xref> or greater than or equal to the number of items.
trans-unit.target: forsøk på å sette egenskapen SelectedIndex til mindre enn <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""> </xref> større enn eller lik antallet elementer.

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever a user changes the selection of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en bruker endrer utvalget av en <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: Changing the selection on the client does not generate a postback event.
trans-unit.target: Endre utvalget på klienten, genererer ikke sende tilbake hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This event is called on the server if a postback event is generated by some other control and the selection has changed.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen kalles på serveren, hvis en sende tilbake hendelse er generert av noen andre kontroller og utvalget er endret.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Returns the selected item, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no selection.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer det valgte elementet eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis det er ingen valg.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: If the control is in multiple selection mode, this property returns the first selected item.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen er i flere valgmodus, returnerer denne egenskapen det første valgte elementet.

trans-unit.source: The currently selected item in the selection list.
trans-unit.target: Det valgte elementet i utvalgslisten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of UI used to provide a selection UI.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir typen Brukergrensesnittet som brukes til å angi et utvalg Brukergrensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: Must be of type <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListSelectType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Må være av typen <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListSelectType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListSelectType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListSelectType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList> object can be rendered as a `CheckBox`, `DropDown`, `ListBox`, `MultiSelectListBox`, or `Radio` list, depending on the target device.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>objektet, kan gjengis som en `CheckBox`, `DropDown`, `ListBox`, `MultiSelectListBox`, eller `Radio` listen, avhengig av målenheten.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>

trans-unit.source: The selection type also affects whether the control allows the user to select multiple items.
trans-unit.target: Utvalgstype påvirker også om kontrollen tillater brukeren å velge flere elementer.

trans-unit.source: The `MultiSelectListBox` and `CheckBox` settings allow multiple selections; other settings allow only a single selection.
trans-unit.target: Den `MultiSelectListBox` og `CheckBox` innstillingene tillater flere valg; andre innstillingene tillater bare ett enkelt valg.

trans-unit.source: The selection types are shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Utvalget typene vises i følgende tabell.

trans-unit.source: |`ListSelectType` value|Description|Multiselect| |----------------------------|-----------------|-----------------| |`CheckBox`|Renders list items with check boxes and multiple selection capability.|Yes| |`DropDown`|Renders list items in a drop-down list box.|No| |`ListBox`|Renders list items in a list box.|No| |`MultipleSelectionListBox`|Renders list items in a list box with multiple selection capability.|Yes| |`Radio`|Renders list items as options.|No|
trans-unit.target: | `ListSelectType` verdien | Beskrivelse | MultiSelect | |----------------------------|-----------------|-----------------| | `CheckBox`| Vis gjengir elementer av i avmerkingsboksene og flere valg-funksjonen. | Ja | | `DropDown`| Vis gjengir elementer i en rullegardinliste. | Ikke | | `ListBox`| Vis gjengir elementer i en liste. | Ikke | | `MultipleSelectionListBox`| Gjengir listeelementer i en liste med flere valg-funksjon. | Ja | | `Radio`| Gjengir listeelementer som alternativer. | Ikke |

trans-unit.source: Type of UI used to provide a selection UI.
trans-unit.target: Type Brukergrensesnittet som brukes til å angi et utvalg Brukergrensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: The key identifying the relevant value in the data.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen for å identifisere den relevante verdien i dataene.

trans-unit.source: The collection containing the post data.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen som inneholder post-dataene.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"></xref> changes as a result of the postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"> </xref> endringer etter tilbakesending; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Title" name="Title" href=""> </xref> attributtet WML enheter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Title" name="Title" href=""></xref> attribute on WML devices.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Title" name="Title" href=""> </xref> attributtet WML enheter.

trans-unit.source: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so they can be stored in the server control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjør at sporing av visningsstatus endringene til serverkontrollen slik at de kan lagres i serverkontrollen <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*> property.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er tilgjengelig via den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*>
